Description: On Rt. 626 in the County of Rockbridge, in the vicinity of Dug Row Rd; Rt. 755E/W (Rockbridge County), motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. All north lanes are closed. All south lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On I-64 in the City of Hampton, at Hampton Roads Bridge Tunnel East, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. All east lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle
